typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		col1 as string,
		col2 as string,
		{col3 } as string
	),
	useSchema: false,
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'td255024',
	folderPath: 'Input',
	fileName: 'UnPivot.txt',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> ColToRowSrc
ColToRowSrc derive(Col4 = split(concat(col1, ",", col2, ",", {col3 }) , ',')) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn foldDown(unroll(Col4),
	mapColumn(
		Col4
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten
Flatten sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Col1 as string,
		Col2 as string,
		Col3 as string,
		Agg_Col as short
	),
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'td255024',
	folderPath: 'Output',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink4

source(output(
		COMPANY as string,
		LOCATION as string
	),
	useSchema: false,
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'td255024',
	folderPath: 'Input',
	fileName: 'CompLoc.txt',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> source
source sort(asc(COMPANY, true),
	caseInsensitive: true) ~> Sort
Sort aggregate(groupBy(COMPANY),
	StrAgg = collect(LOCATION),
		count = count(LOCATION)) ~> Aggregate
Aggregate sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['COMPANY','StrAgg','count'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		COMPANY,
		StrAgg,
		count
	)) ~> sink1

expression.value: @equals(activity('Get scehma from ref file').output.structure,activity('get Schema of file').output.structure)
@equals(activity('get Schema of file').output,activity('Get scehma from ref file').output.structure)
@equals(activity('Get scehma from ref file').output.structure,activity('get Schema of file').output.structure)
